page.title: 04An Oldrids Worker
page.content: Tina Edgoose works on the makeup desk at Oldrids.She sells expensive perfume and hairsprays.She has to wear a special suit in summer and winter. She works eight hours each day.The busiest day is Friday.Quite alot of the foreign customers that go there are French.She has worked there for eight years and finds that it has changed quite alot since she started working there.She finds that it is quite hard work at times.There is three different departments for Oldrids.There is Oldrids Downtown and one on George street.Oldrids Downtown is a carpet and indoor furnishings department.
